name: UpdateProjectBoard
description:
Update a project board's information on GitHub.

This tool updates the details of a specified project board on GitHub. It should be called when there is a need to modify the information of a project board. Note that a `404` error indicates projects are disabled, while a `401` or `410` error indicates insufficient privileges.

parameters.name: project_unique_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the GitHub project board to update.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the project.

parameters.name: project_description
parameters.description: A detailed description or content of the project board.

parameters.name: project_name
parameters.description: The new name for the project board. Must be a string.

parameters.name: organization_permission_level
parameters.description: Sets the baseline permission for all organization members on this project. Options are 'read', 'write', 'admin', or 'none'.

value_schema.description: The baseline permission that all organization members have on this project

parameters.name: project_state
parameters.description: Specify the state of the project; use 'open' or 'closed'.

value_schema.description: State of the project; either 'open' or 'closed'

parameters.name: is_private
parameters.description: A boolean indicating if the project is private. Set to true for private (not visible to everyone) and false for public.

value_schema.description: Whether or not this project can be seen by everyone.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the project.

parameters.name: organization_permission
parameters.description: The baseline permission that all organization members have on this project

value_schema.description: The baseline permission that all organization members have on this project

parameters.name: private
parameters.description: Whether or not this project can be seen by everyone.

value_schema.description: Whether or not this project can be seen by everyone.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State of the project; either 'open' or 'closed'

value_schema.description: State of the project; either 'open' or 'closed'

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
